attributes.action: Make Anti-spiking bottle covered available in nightclubs and bars.
attributes.additional_details: Because they’re in charge of our safety and it’s 100% something that could happen or has happened to someone who works within the government.
attributes.background: I think it’s important for women and men to be able to access drink protection while out with friends, anti spike protectors could save 100s of people from being spiked, raped, murdered and face potential death.
